Package chess

Interface Chesspiece

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public interface Chesspiece
interface that defines certain methods and allows for the use of polymorphism in code

    • isValidMove

      boolean isValidMove(ChessPosition curPos, ChessPosition endPos)
      checks to see if a certain move is valid based on the rules in play
      Parameters:
      curPos - current position of piece
      endPos - end position of piece
      Returns:
      true if valid move, else false
